content.question: Given f(x) = <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="f of x equals x plus 1 for x less than 0, and cosine open parentheses pi times x close parentheses for x greater than or equal to 0"> <semantics> <mrow><mo>{</mo> <mrow> <mtable columnalign="left"> <mtr columnalign="left"> <mtd columnalign="left"> <mrow> <mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> </mtd> <mtd columnalign="left"> <mrow> <mtext>for </mtext><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mtext>0</mtext></mrow> </mtd> </mtr> <mtr columnalign="left"> <mtd columnalign="left"> <mrow> <mi>cos</mi><mi>π</mi></mrow> </mtd> <mtd columnalign="left"> <mrow> <mtext>for </mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>≥</mo><mtext>0</mtext></mrow> </mtd> </mtr> </mtable></mrow> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaGabaWdaeaafaqaaeGacaaabaGaamiEaiabgUcaRiaaigdaaeaa peGaaeOzaiaab+gacaqGYbGaaeiiaiaadIhacqGH8aapcaqGWaaapa qaaiGacogacaGGVbGaai4Caiabec8aWbqaa8qacaqGMbGaae4Baiaa bkhacaqGGaGaamiEaiabgwMiZkaabcdaaaaacaGL7baaaaa@4BB7@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the integral from negative 1 to 1 of f of x with respect to x equals"> <mrow> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow><munderover> <mo>∫</mo> <mrow> <mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow> <mn>1</mn> </munderover> <mi>f</mi> </mrow> </mstyle><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo></mrow> </math>

choices.label: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="one half plus 1 divided by pi"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo><mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mi>π</mi> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaaaacqGHRaWkdaWc aaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaeqiWdahaaaaa@3B83@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="negative one half plus pi"> <semantics> <mrow> <mo>−</mo><mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo><mi>π</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacqGHsisldaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaaaacqGH RaWkcqaHapaCaaa@3B67@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>
